title: Learning Analytics-Driven Mathematics Education Design and Implementation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics education theory and basic instructional design knowledge
context.additional_context: Process for prospective teachers to learn applying minimal/strong instructional strategies in math classes using learning analytics (LA) tools

learning_goals: Interpret learning analytics data to diagnose individual learning tendencies.
Design and implement Learning Analytics (LA)-based minimal/robust instructional strategies in math classes.
Propose instructional design plans to improve students' self-regulated learning (SRL) abilities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
